articles.title: KPA Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
KPA Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- A military delegation of the Korean People's Army led by Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, left here on Tuesday to visit China.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations and Delegates Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations and Delegates Arrive
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of banks and companies of Russia, Mozambique, Mongolia, India, Thailand and France arrived here on Tuesday to participate in the celebrations of the 50th founding anniversary of the Foreign Trade Bank of the DPRK.
					 Earlier, a Malaysian delegation arrived here.

articles.title: Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Cuban Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- A reception was given by Jose Manuel Galego Montano, ambassador of Cuba to the DPRK, at his embassy on Monday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education who is chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador noted in his speech that the Korean people have achieved signal successes in their 150-day campaign under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, expressing hope that they would make great progress in socialist construction in the future, too.
					
					 The Cuban people will further boost the friendly relations with the Korean people in their struggle to foil the moves of the imperialists for aggression and blockade and defend the sovereignty of the country and socialism, he added.
					
					 He declared the Cuban people would always stand by the Korean people in the struggle for achieving the common purposes.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop said in his speech that President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK, bringing about a radical turn in carving out the destiny of the country and its people and in carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Kim Il Sung's immortal idea of the nation-building and his feats performed in it remain shining thanks to Kim Jong Il and the DPRK has entered a new higher stage in its development, he stressed.
					
					 He referred to the fact that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries have grown stronger on the invariable principle and sense of obligation under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: "Unyo-maru" Incident, Prelude to Armed Aggression
articles.content:
"Unyo-maru" Incident, Prelude to Armed Aggression
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- The "Unyo-maru" intrusion incident perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists in the past was a prelude to their armed invasion against Korea.
					 Japan let its warship "Unyo-maru" illegally intrude into Pusan Port as the first stage for the aggression of Korea in May of 1875 in accordance with the "theory of the conquest of Korea".
					
					 The aggressors attempted to overawe the Korean government and achieve their end without difficulty while committing various provocations under the pretext of the so-called military exercise.
					
					However, the things went athwart. They infiltrated "Unyo-maru" into the sea off the Kanghwa Island in September of that year again near the Chojijin battery, an important fortress of Korea, by which any foreign warships could not pass without prior approval.
					
					 While firing guns on the Chojijin battery, the aggressors attacked Jongsan and Yongjong islets with weak defence facilities and slaughtered innocent people only to be meted out due punishment by the indignant Korean defenders.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the Japanese aggressors raved that the Korean side committed hostile acts against Japan as the thief turns on the master with a club. They again infiltrated an aggressive fleet into the sea off Kanghwa Island and forced the Korean government to conclude an unequal treaty.
					
					 Claiming compensation for the "damage inflicted on Unyo-maru", they compelled the feudal government of Ri Dynasty to sign the "Korea-Japan Friendship Treaty" (the "Kanghwa Island Treaty") in the early of 1876.
					
					 With the illegal treaty as a pretext, old Japan infiltrated deep into the political, economic, cultural and other fields of Korea and occupied her by force of arms in the long run, imposing immeasurable misfortunes and sufferings on the Korean people during the 40-odd-year-long colonial rule.
					
					 More than 130 years have passed since the "Unyo-maru" intrusion incident, the Korean people do never forget the crimes committed against the Korean nation by the Japanese imperialists who had stretched their dark claws of aggression to Korea from many years ago.
					
					 Japan must apologize and pay reparation for its past crimes without fail.

articles.title: KCNA Slams Japan's Moves to Develop Space Weapons
articles.content:
KCNA Slams Japan's Moves to Develop Space Weapons 
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Japan recently launched a large carrier rocket H2B-1.
					 It was reported that Japan would continue launching such rockets under the pretext of launching space cargo vehicles in the future. 
					
					 This is a very dangerous development as it indicates that Japan is pushing forward the moves to develop a large-size space weapon system in real earnest. 
					
					 Japan's large carrier rockets are part of the space weapon system. 
					
					 Japan has systematically stepped up the development of large carrier rockets, regarding the process of rounding off the space weapon system as an essential course of turning Japan into a military giant.
					
					 In 1969 Japan concluded an agreement on cooperation in the field of conquering space with the United States, thus paving the way for exploring the field of space rocket technology. In 1984 it decided to develop a "completed prototype rocket" capable of easily converting itself into an intercontinental ballistic missile. As a result, Japan launched the domestically made large carrier rocket H-2 in 1994.
					
					 Last year Japan adopted even the "basic law on space" which defines the use of space for military purposes as a policy, thus laying a legal groundwork for accelerating the development of the space weapon system. 
					
					 Japan has consolidated the material, technological and practical foundations for deploying space weapons on the basis of the steady improvement of the performance of such large carrier rockets as H-2 and H2B-1. 
					
					 As seen above, the above-said moves of Japan are closely linked with its wild ambition for militarizing space and turning it into a military power.
					
					 The recent launch of H2B-1 goes to prove that Japan's moves for converting itself into a military power by dint of military edge in space have reached an ever more reckless phase. 
					
					 The international community should take these moves very serious. 
					
					 The UN Security Council, however, persistently and unreasonably took issue with the DPRK's legitimate launch of a satellite for the space development for peaceful purposes, while keeping mum about the above-said moves of Japan.  
					
					 As already clarified, the DPRK acceded to the international treaties on space, prompted by its noble aim to boost international confidence and cooperation in the fields of research into space science and satellite launch before launching satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 on a fair and aboveboard basis and making public information about it as required by the treaties. 
					
					 But Japan launched four spy satellites by H-2A in 2003 and 2007 in crude violation of the provisions of the international treaties and has so far kept information about them secret. 
					
					 Had the UNSC have even an iota of impartiality, it should have taken issue with Japan's launch of those satellites and their performance before anything else as they have disturbed the world peace and security by perpetrating espionage from space, a treasure  of whole mankind. 
					
					 The UNSC, however, has not yet made any apology for kicking up a ruckus over the DPRK's satellite launch only. This is, indeed, an entirely unjust behavior. 
					
					 The UNSC should take strong measures to check Japan's moves to develop the space weapon system so as to fulfill its duty to contribute to the world peace and security on the principle of impartiality.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Stop Arms Sale to S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Stop Arms Sale to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. Congressional Research Service released a report which said that its arms sale topped the world list of arms sale.
					 Commenting on this, a news analyst of Minju Joson Tuesday observes: The U.S. is the world's arch criminal sparking regional conflicts and "the world's biggest proliferators of WMDs." 
					
					 The news analyst goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is busy developing and producing sophisticated WMDs and selling them for the purpose of establishing worldwide hegemony by use of force.
					
					 Its arms sales are escalating conflicts, disputes and arms race between countries in different regions, seriously threatening global peace and security and rendering the international situation complicated. 
					
					 Its steady expansion of arms sale is aimed at bringing increased profits to its war industrial complexes. 
					
					A particular mention should be made of the fact that the U.S. is stepping up its arms sale to south Korea in real earnest in a bid to spark new arms race and disturb peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The above-said development is a dangerous military move to round off the preparations for launching the second Korean war through a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK by using south Korea as a shock brigade as it is a revelation of Washington's invariable hostile policy toward Pyongyang. 
					
					 Due to the U.S. moves to beef up its combat forces south Korea has turned into a dangerous hotbed of a new war, a nuclear war, and the situation on the Korean Peninsula is getting extremely tense.
					
					 This is a criminal act of further escalating the tension and military confrontation on the Korean Peninsula and, furthermore, seriously threatening world peace and stability. 
					
					 With nothing can the U.S. evade its responsibility as the arch criminal disturbing global peace and stability.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Revolutionary Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Revolutionary Exploits Praised
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Tuesday dedicate editorials to the 60th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The editorials stress that Kim Jong Suk has been highly praised by all people century after century as the great revolutionary, the great patriot and the great human being for the immortal exploits she performed on behalf of the era and the revolution, the country and the nation.
					
					 Her whole life is that of the first-line bodyguard who set a shining example in devotedly defending the leader and the noble life of the great revolutionary who made immortal contribution to the building of the Juche-oriented revolutionary armed forces, Rodong Sinmun says in its editorial, and goes on:
					
					 Her life is shining as the very noble life as she dedicated her all to the revolutionary comrades and the country and the people.
					
					 With warm love for the country and the people, she made immortal contribution to the struggle for building a new Korea true to President Kim Il Sung's line of nation-building after the liberation of the country.
					
					 She provided sure guarantee for the army and the people of the DPRK to carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche to the last while being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation. This is the greatest exploit she performed for the country and the revolution and the future of the nation.
					
					The Korean army and people have held General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem at the head of the party, the army and the state, as desired by Kim Jong Suk, which makes it possible to accomplish the revolutionary cause of the President generation after generation to the last and achieve the prosperity of the country and the nation under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Her undying exploits are the most valuable asset of the Korean revolution and the eternal wealth of Kim Il Sung's Korea and Kim Il Sung's nation that displays its great vitality more strikingly with the progress of the revolution and shift in generations.
					
					 Minju Joson says that it is high pride and honor of the Korean army and people to live and work, holding in high esteem as the eternal mother of revolution Kim Jong Suk who established the brilliant tradition of devotedly defending the leader and set a noble example in doing so in the course of the rigorous Korean revolution, thus providing the most precious and eternal wealth of revolution for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered in Mt. Paektu generation after generation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk's Demise Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk's Demise Observed
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association issued a bulletin on Sept. 16 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of demise of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Dec. 24 in Korea" said:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk boundlessly revered by the Korean people as an anti-Japanese heroine was born on Dec. 24, 1917.
					
					 She took part in the anti-Japanese armed struggle with arms in hand in her early years, greatly contributing to liberating the country. 
					
					 The greatest of her exploits is that she protected the headquarters of the Korean revolution at the risk of her life and provided a sure guarantee for carrying forward the cause of socialism in the DPRK generation after generation.
					
					 Her life and exploits will remain long with eternally prospering socialist Korea.

articles.title: On Day of First Democratic Elections
articles.content:
On Day of First Democratic Elections
 Pyongyang, September 22 (KCNA) -- It was one day of November, Juche 35 (1946) when anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk took part in the first historic democratic elections at Jungsong constituency, Central District (then), Pyongyang.
					 She, who cast a patriotic ballot, said called upon the cheering crowd to positively turn out in the building of a new Korea, upholding the teachings of General Kim Il Sung in order to further consolidate and develop the people's power, saying that they could greet this auspicious day as they held him in high esteem.
					
					 She went on to say to the following effect: Our workers and peasants who had had little knowledge of the regime and election in the past came to participate in the elections and express their will today.
					
					 Looking around the masses attentively listening to her who imbued the consciousness of being the master and patriotism in their hearts, she added:
					
					 The women who make up a half of the population have attended the elections as proud voters and many women were nominated and elected as candidates for members of the people's committees at all levels. All the women should strive harder to lay the foundation for the construction of the nation to repay to the great benevolence of General Kim Il Sung.
					
					 These words are still engraved in the hearts of the Korean people.

articles.title: Acto central en memoria de Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Acto central en memoria de Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, 22 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este martes en Pyongyang el solemne acto central de recordacion a la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk por el 60o aniversario de su fallecimiento.
					  Asistieron al conclave los cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, organizaciones sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los ex-combatientes revolucionarios antijaponeses, los familiares de los martires revolucionarios, los benemeritos, los trabajadores capitalinos y la delegacion de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon, compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					  Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de Kim Jong Suk.
					
					  El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, quien dijo en particular:  
					
					  La vida revolucionaria de Kim Jong Suk quien dedico todo lo suyo por el lider, la patria y el pueblo fue la vida de la fidelidad al Presidente   Kim Il Sung, la de la lucha por la revolucion y la de la  abnegacion por la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					  La Heroina, quien emprendio a su tierna edad el camino de la revolucion, tomo el fusil en sus manos durante toda su vida y dedico todo lo suyo a defender a costa de la vida en lo ideologico y politico al Presidente y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada por este. Por lo tanto, ella fue la distinguida revolucionaria, la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa y la gran madre de Corea.
					
					  Su infinita fidelidad al Presidente se puso de pleno manifiesto al desempenar siempre el papel de combatiente vanguardia en la lucha por defender y materializar estrictamente la idea y la linea  revolucionarias del Presidente.
					
					  Ella no solo exalto altamente su nombre como generala del monte Paektu en el combate contra los imperialistas japoneses tomando el fusil en la mano sino tambien hizo aporte especial a la realizacion del proyecto estrategico del Presidente como habil trabajadora politica.
					
					   Despues de la liberacion (agosto de 1945), ella hizo todos sus esfuerzos por la fundacion y el desarrollo de las fuerzas armadas regulares del pais en acato a la linea del Presidente en materia de la fundacion del ejercito, porque amo infinitamente el fusil.
					
					  Tanto en los dias de la larga lucha armada antijaponsa como en el periodo de la construccion de la nueva patria ella dedico toda su vida a la labor para sostener al Presidente sin descansar tranquilamente ni un momento. Por lo tanto, su vida se transmite como el modelo de la fidelidad que mostro como debe apoyar a su lider el revolucionario.
					
					  La vida revolucionaria de la Heroina fue la vida del ferviente amor y abnegacion a los camaradas revolucionarios y otros habitantes.
					
					  Kim Jong Suk es la gran madre de la revolucion y benefactora de la nacion porque al criar a su hijo Kim Jong Il como estrella luz del monte Paektu hizo llevar adelante con firmeza la causa revolucionaria del Juche y dejo abierto el radiante futuro de la nacion de Kim Il Sung.
					
					  Gracias a estas proezas de la Heroina acumulada en las tempestades de la revolucion, el pueblo coreano pudo tener la fortuna de disfrutar de generacion en generacion de la direccion del destacado lider y del gran general y exaltar el orgullo como pueblo digno que continua con firmeza el linaje del monte Paektu.
					
					  En acato al deseo de Kim Jong Suk,  debemos enaltecer al Presidente como eterno Sol del Juche y levantar a toda costa en esta tierra una gran potencia prospera socialista que exalta la dignidad de la independencia y el poderio del Songun (priorizacion militar) bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Actos por aniversario 60 de fallecimiento de Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Actos por aniversario 60 de fallecimiento de Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, 22 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario del fallecimiento de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk tuvieron lugar en varias localidades diferentes actos como funciones artisticas, conciertos de recordacion, escenas de recordacion y encuentros de publicacion de virtud para recordar la vida revolucionaria e inmortales hazanas de ella.
					  En la funcion de los artistas de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional efectuado en el capitalino Teatro Moranbong los ejecutantes elogiaron en alto las hazanas de la direccion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien hace florecer sobre esta tierra la historia revolucionaria, el noble proposito y deseo de la Heroina.
					
					  La funcion de los artistas del Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional efectuado en la Casa Central de la Juventud hizo llenar el salon del ardiente sentimiento de veneracion hacia la verdadera soldado revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung, Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa.
					
					  En el teatro de arte de la provincia de Ryanggang  hubo la funcion de la opera revolucionaria "Con la luz del sol" y en el teatro de arte de la provincia de Kangwon, el drama "Florita roja".
					
					  Las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea (UMDC) en la ciudad de Kaesong organizaron el encuentro de estudio sobre la noble vida revolucionaria de Kim Jong Suk y la tertulia sobre las virtudes de ella.
					
					    De los conciertos de recordacion y funciones de los conjuntos artisticos y entidades de masas de las provincias de Hamgyong del Norte, de Phyong-an del Sur y del Norte, de Hwanghae del Norte y otras localidades sonaron las canciones para elogiar las hazanas de la Heroina 
					
					  Las funcionarias y otras miembros de la UMDC en la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur tuvieron el encuentro de recordacion y los trabajadores agricolas, la escena de recordacion
					
					  En el lugar de batalla revolucionaria de Insan tuvieron lugar el concierto y el encuentro de recordacion de las miembros de la UMDC y los trabajadores agricolas  en la provincia de Jagang.

articles.title: Periodicos elogian hazanas revolucionarias de Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Periodicos elogian hazanas revolucionarias de Kim Jong Suk
Pyongyang, 22 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos, en respectivos editoriales de este martes dedicados al 60o aniversario del fallecimiento de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk, senalan que ella disfruta de siglo en siglo de infinito elogio de todo el mundo como gran revolucionaria, gran patriota y gran hombre por haber acumulado inmortales meritos ante la epoca, la revolucion, la patria y la nacion.
					Toda la vida de la Heroina es la de la soldado fiel y de escolta quien creo el brillante modelo de la defensa a costa de la vida al lider, y la noble vida de la gran revolucionaria quien hizo gran aporte a la causa de la construccion de las autoctonas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, comienza el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					La vida de Kim Jong Suk brilla como la noble vida que dedico lo todo a los camaradas revolucionarios, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria, con el ilimitado amor por la patria y el pueblo, ella hizo inmortal contribucion a la lucha por construir nueva Corea en pleno acato a la linea de edificacion del Estado del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Ella aseguro la firme garantiza de que el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos pueden llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la sabia direccion de generacion en generacion del gran Lider y del gran General, lo cual es la maxima hazana realizada por ella para el porvenir de la patria, la revolucion y la nacion.
					
					Segun el anhelo de la Heroina, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea enaltecen al Dirigente Kim Jong Il al primer puesto del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, cumplen hasta el fin de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Presidente y logran la eterna prosperidad de la patria y la nacion.
					
					Las inmortales hazanas de Kim Jong Suk son el mas valioso patrimonio de la revolucion coreana y la riqueza eterna de Corea de Kim Il Sung, la nacion de Kim Il Sung que manifiesta la gran vitalidad cada vez que avanza la revolucion y cambia la generacion.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson subraya que el gran orgullo y honor del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos son vivir y luchar teniendo en gran estima a la Heroina Kim Jong Suk como la eterna madre de la revolucion quien creo la brillante tradicion y el noble modelo de defender a costa de la vida al lider en la trayectoria de la ardua revolucion coreana y preparo la mas valiosa riqueza eterna de la revolucion capaz de cumplir hasta el fin la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu.

articles.title: Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Embajador cubano ofrece banquete por efemeride coreana
Pyongyang, 22 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 61o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, Jose Manuel Galego Montano, ofrecio el dia 21 el banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					A la comida fueron invitados Yang Hyong Sop, vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Jin, ministro de Educacion y presidente del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, Ro Song Sil, presidenta del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun y otros funcionarios.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, el embajador cubano deseo tambien en el futuro gran progreso en la construccion socialista al pueblo coreano, que habia obtenido excelentes exitos en la campana de 150 dias bajo la sabia direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Prosiguio que el pueblo cubano fortalecera mas las relaciones de amistad con el pueblo coreano en el camino para frustrar las maquinaciones de agresion y bloqueo de los imperialistas y defender la soberania del pais y el socialismo.
					
					Subrayo que el pueblo cubano estara siempre al lado del pueblo coreano en la lucha por llevar a cabo el objetivo comun.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop dijo, a su vez, que gracias a la fundacion de la RPDC por el presidente Kim Il Sung, se produjo un viraje radical en el destino de Corea y su pueblo, y en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					La idea y las proezas inmortales de construccion del Estado del Presidente Kim Il Sung estan glorificadas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y ahora la RPDC esta en una nueva etapa mas alta de su desarrollo, destaco el.
					
					Finalizo que bajo la gran atencion de los dirigentes supremos, las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre Corea y Cuba se fortalecen y se desarrollan basandose en los invariables principios y la obligacion moral.
